Class.Name: Real*
Class.Description: Gets the product of a bunch of reals.

FormalParameter.Name: reals
FormalParameter.Description: The reals to multiply.

Class.Name: Ceiling
Class.Description: Gets the ceiling of the given real number. This is the smallest integer that is greater than or equal to the number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to get the ceiling of.

Class.Name: Pow
Class.Description: Raises a given number by another number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The base number to raise by an exponent.

FormalParameter.Name: exponent
FormalParameter.Description: The exponent for the base number.

Class.Name: ASin
Class.Description: Gets the arc sine of the given number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to get the arc sine of.

Class.Name: Tan
Class.Description: Gets the tangent of the given number. The number is assumed to be in radians.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number, in radians, to get the tangent of.

Class.Name: Mod
Class.Description: Gets the modulus of the given numbers. This is the remainder of one number divided by another. For instance, 7 mod 3 is 1, because 1 is what remains of 7 after 3 has been divided evenly into it. As a second example, 7 mod 3 mod 1 is 0, because 1 evenly divides 1.

FormalParameter.Name: integers
FormalParameter.Description: The integers to get the modulus of.

Class.Name: Int+
Class.Description: Adds a bunch of integers together.

FormalParameter.Name: integers
FormalParameter.Description: The integers to add together.

Class.Name: Exp
Class.Description: Gets Euler's number, e, raised to a given power.

FormalParameter.Name: exponent
FormalParameter.Description: An exponent to e.

Class.Name: Sqrt
Class.Description: Gets the square root of the given number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to get the square root of.

Class.Name: Round
Class.Description: Rounds the given real number to an integer. For instance, 3.5 => 4.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to round.

Class.Name: RealMin
Class.Description: Gets the smallest real number in a list of real numbers.

FormalParameter.Name: reals
FormalParameter.Description: The real numbers to get the minimum of.

Class.Name: Floor
Class.Description: Gets the floor of the given real number. This is the greatest integer that is less than or equal to the number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to get the floor of.

Class.Name: Int*
Class.Description: Gets the product of a bunch of integers.

FormalParameter.Name: integers
FormalParameter.Description: The integers to multiply.

Class.Name: GCD
Class.Description: Gets the greatest common divisor of two integers. This is the largest integer than can divide both numbers evenly.

FormalParameter.Name: num1
FormalParameter.Description: The first number.

FormalParameter.Name: num2
FormalParameter.Description: The second number.

Class.Name: Sin
Class.Description: Gets the sine of the given number. The number is assumed to be in radians.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number, in radians, to get the sine of.

Class.Name: Real/
Class.Description: Divides a bunch of reals. For instance, if given 2.5, 4, 7.3, this returns 2.5 / 4 / 7.3. Throws a ReplaceException if a divide by 0 is attempted.

FormalParameter.Name: reals
FormalParameter.Description: The real numbers to divide.

Class.Name: ATan
Class.Description: gets the arc tangent of the given number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to get the arc tangent of.

Class.Name: Real+
Class.Description: Adds a bunch of reals together.

FormalParameter.Name: reals
FormalParameter.Description: The reals to add together.

Class.Name: Int/
Class.Description: Divides a bunch of integers. For instance, if given 1, 2, 3, this returns 1 / 2 / 3. Throws a ReplaceException if an attempt is made to divide by 0.

FormalParameter.Name: integers
FormalParameter.Description: The integers to divide.

Class.Name: IntMax
Class.Description: Gets the largest integer in the given bunch of integers.

FormalParameter.Name: integers
FormalParameter.Description: The integers to get the max of.

Class.Name: Truncate
Class.Description: Truncates the given real number to an integer. For instance, 3.5 => 3.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to truncate.

Class.Name: Cos
Class.Description: Gets the cosine of the given number. The number is assumed to be in radians.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number, in radians, to get the cosine of.

Class.Name: RealMax
Class.Description: Gets the largest real number in the given bunch of real numbers.

FormalParameter.Name: reals
FormalParameter.Description: The reals to get the max of.

Class.Name: Log
Class.Description: Gets the logarithm of the given number. If it's provided with a base, then it will return the logarithm with the given base. If it's not provided with a base, then it will return the natural logarithm of the given number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to get the logarithm of.

FormalParameter.Name: base
FormalParameter.Description: The base for the logarithm. Without a specified base, this defaults to getting the natural logarithm.

Class.Name: ACos
Class.Description: Gets the arc cosine of the given number.

FormalParameter.Name: num
FormalParameter.Description: The number to get the arc cosine of.

Class.Name: Real-
Class.Description: Subtracts a bunch of reals from each other. For instance, if given 1.5, 2.5, 2, then this will return 1.5 - 2.5 - 2.

FormalParameter.Name: reals
FormalParameter.Description: The reals to subtract from each other.

Class.Name: Int-
Class.Description: Subtracts a bunch of integers from each other. For instance, if given 1, 2, 3, then this will return 1 - 2 - 3.

FormalParameter.Name: integers
FormalParameter.Description: The integers to subtract from each other.

Class.Name: LCM
Class.Description: Gets the least common multiple of two integers. This is the smallest integer that is a multiple of both numbers. Throws a ReplaceException if the GCD of the two numbers is 0 (which really shouldn't be possible.)

FormalParameter.Name: num1
FormalParameter.Description: The first integer.

FormalParameter.Name: num2
FormalParameter.Description: The second integer.

Class.Name: IntMin
Class.Description: Gets the smallest integer in a list of integers.

FormalParameter.Name: integers
FormalParameter.Description: The integers to get the minimum of.

Class.Name: Random
Class.Description: Gets a random real number between 0 and 1.
